member.name: ID3D11CryptoSession.GetCertificate
member.param: The size of the pCertificate array, in bytes. To get the size of the certificate chain, call .
A pointer to a byte array that receives the driver's certificate chain. The caller must allocate the array.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11CryptoSession.GetCertificateSize
member.summary: Gets the size of the driver's certificate chain.
member.param: Receives the size of the certificate chain, in bytes.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID3D11CryptoSession.GetCryptoSessionHandle
member.summary: Gets a handle to the cryptographic session.
member.param: Receives a handle to the session.

member.name: ID3D11CryptoSession.GetCryptoType
member.summary: Gets the type of encryption that is supported by this session.

param.name: pCryptoType
param.para: Receives a GUID that specifies the encryption type. The following GUIDs are defined.

listheader.description: 128-bit Advanced Encryption Standard CTR mode (AES-CTR) block cipher.

member.name: ID3D11CryptoSession.GetDecoderProfile
member.summary: Gets the decoding profile of the session.
member.param: Receives the decoding profile. For a list of possible values, see .
